params.name: channel
params.description: Name of the channel to watch over

returns.name: ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the uploaded video

returns.name: CHANNEL_ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the channel the video was uploaded to

returns.name: CHANNEL_TITLE
returns.description: Name of the channel the video was uploaded to

actions.name: Youtube_OnYtPlaylistAdd
actions.description: Event triggered when a video is added to a playlist

params.name: playlistId
params.description: ID of the playlist to watch over

returns.name: ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the added video

returns.name: CHANNEL_ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the channel the video was added to

returns.name: CHANNEL_TITLE
returns.description: Name of the channel the video belongs to

params.name: videoId
params.description: ID of the video to like

returns.name: ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the liked video

params.name: videoId
params.description: ID of the video to comment

returns.name: ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the commented video

reactions.name: Youtube_YtAddToPlaylist
reactions.description: Add a Youtube video to a playlist

params.name: videoId
params.description: ID of the video to add

params.name: playlistId
params.description: ID of the playlist to add the video to

returns.name: VIDEO_ID
returns.description: Youtube ID of the added video
